name: amethyst
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a transparent purple stone used in jewellery: She wore a plain necklace of amethysts. Bishops and cardinals used to wear amethyst as a symbol of peace.
PeterHermesFurian/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] a purple colour: The gown is made from silk crepe fabric in dusty amethyst.
More examplesFewer examplesAn amethyst is set into the handle of the sword.Amethysts, emeralds, topaz, and sapphires litter workshops like colourful marbles.Her expensive soft woollen coat was a deep shade of amethyst.
